home.title: Clans of Caledonia Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Clans of Caledonia against Automa, the solo opponent.
home.play2: This application replaces the Automa cards, and guides you through the game flow. Additionally, it automates the tech card drafting and prosperity card selection.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
